titles.title: The Lord Is My Strength And My Song

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord is my strength and my song
And is become my salvation;
I shall not die but live
And declare Thy works, O my Lord.
Great is the Lord!
Mighty is Your Name!
I will pay my vows unto Thee, Lord,
In the courts of Thy house,
In the midst of Thy saints,
In the midst of Thee, Jerusalem.
Thou hast delivered my soul from death,
My eyes from tears, my feet from falling,
I will take the cup of salvation
And call upon Thy name, O my Lord
